content.query:
-- Sample table schema for storing a model and related data
CREATE TABLE #Models_test
(
    [Model] [varbinary](max) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

-- Copy command to load hexadecimal string of the model from Azure Data Lake storage location
COPY INTO #Models_test (Model)
FROM 'https://uiapsynapsedl.blob.core.windows.net/models/hex/model.onnx.hex'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Storage Account Key', SECRET='6IJl3LEJh0J49PaxUdd2iaiSCgV1wGuHRkW7kg6DHWIzyfEPXaLiJ9WlpfJomU01frb5f7Stpzy8w85nQlMnVw==')
)
